Name: Apple & Elderflower Collins
Ingredients: 30 ml Thomas Henry Soda Water chilled
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir.
Review: A John Collins with lime in place of lemon and sweetened with apple and elderflower liqueurs.
History: Created in 2004 by yours truly in London, England. Collins Cocktail history and recipes
Nutrition: One serving of Apple & Elderflower Collins contains 252 calories
